data.name: AccountDeleteConfirm
data.value: The account will be permanently deleted. All files used by the account will remain on the device in encrypted form. If you have transferred the deleting account to another device, these files can be decrypted on that device. After deleting the account, you can register a new one with the same name, or restore it from the recovery file if it was created. Continue?

data.name: AccountDeleted
data.value: The account has been successfully deleted.

data.name: AccountDeleteMessage
data.value: Your account will be completely deleted from this device. Continue?

data.name: AccountTransferMessage
data.value: A file containing your account data will be created. This will allow you to transfer your account to another device. Continue?

data.name: AreYouSure
data.value: Are you sure?

data.name: Confirm
data.value: Confirm

data.name: ConfirmDelete
data.value: Do you really want to delete this record?

data.name: DataDoesntMatch
data.value: The data doesn't match.

data.name: Delete
data.value: Delete

data.name: EnterNewAuthData
data.value: You need to enter new authorization data or delete the existing account from the device.

data.name: Error
data.value: Error

data.name: ErrorAuthDataObfuscation
data.value: The file structure is broken. The user data cannot be retrieved. Make sure that the file was generated by this program and no changes were made to it.

data.name: ErrorEmptyPassword
data.value: The password can't be empty.

data.name: ErrorEmptySite
data.value: The site name can't be empty.

data.name: ErrorEmptyUsername
data.value: The username can't be empty.

data.name: ErrorFileContent
data.value: The file is corrupt and can't be read. A third party or a third-party program may have been made changes.

data.name: ErrorFileNotExist
data.value: The file was not found.

data.name: ErrorKey
data.value: This file can't be opened by current user.

data.name: ErrorLengthUsername
data.value: The length of the username can't be less than 5 or more than 20 symbols.

data.name: ErrorOpenInBrowser
data.value: Can't open the site. Try to go to it manually.

data.name: ExceptionKeyExist
data.value: For this user a key already exist. Just login.

data.name: ExceptionKeyNotFound
data.value: A key with this ID is not found in the database.

data.name: ExceptionLengthPassword
data.value: The password must be at least 6 characters long.

data.name: ExceptionUserExist
data.value: The user with same name already exist.

data.name: ExceptionUserNotExist
data.value: The user with this name is not exist.

data.name: FileCreated
data.value: The file has created successfully.

data.name: FileName
data.value: The file name:

data.name: IncorrectPassword
data.value: The password is incorrect. Check your username and password. It is case sensitive.

data.name: Information
data.value: Information

data.name: KeyNotExist
data.value: There is no key in the database for this user.

data.name: KeyReady
data.value: Your key is ready. Press the button to go the main page.

data.name: LoggedAlready
data.value: There is an active user. Log out from the account to log in again.

data.name: Logout
data.value: Logout

data.name: LogoutMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to logout?

data.name: NewKeyGenerationMessage
data.value: A new key will be generated for the account. You will be able to specify files encrypted with the old key, which must be encrypted with the new key. Opening the files, which were not specified in the previous step, will be impossible. The current window will be close, so save the changes in the files. The operation will take a long time. Continue?

data.name: NewRecord
data.value: New record

data.name: OpenNewFileMessage
data.value: Changes in current file will not been saved. Open another one?

data.name: PasswordNotMatchCurrent
data.value: Inputted password doesn't match with the password of the current account.

data.name: PasswordsDontMatch
data.value: The passwords don't match.

data.name: PasswordsOldNewEquals
data.value: The new password equals the old one.

data.name: PasswordWasChanged
data.value: The password was succesfully changed.

data.name: ProgramCloseMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to close the program?

data.name: RecoverySuccess
data.value: Account recovery completed successfully.

data.name: RedirectToAuthorization
data.value: You will be redirected to the authorization page.

data.name: RedirectToKeyRegistration
data.value: You will be redirected to the key registration page.

data.name: RedirectToSelectFiles
data.value: You will be redirected to the select files page.

data.name: RepeatedPasswordDoesntMatch
data.value: The repeated password doesn't match.

data.name: SameOrNoneUsernames
data.value: The database contains some records with this user name or none.

data.name: SameUsernames
data.value: The database contains some records with this user name.

data.name: SaveChanges
data.value: Save changes?

data.name: SaveFileMessage
data.value: Save file changes? The file will be encrypted and rewritten. The operation can take a long time.

data.name: SaveSuccess
data.value: Save completed successfully.

data.name: ShowEditRecord
data.value: Show/edit record

data.name: Success
data.value: Success

data.name: UnhandledExceptionNotify
data.value: An unhandled exception has occurred, the program will be closed. Contact the developer and report it.

data.name: UpdateKeyCompleted
data.value: The process is completed successfully.

data.name: UpdateKeyStage1
data.value: I'm decrypting files.

data.name: UpdateKeyStage2
data.value: I'm updating the key in the database.

data.name: UpdateKeyStage3
data.value: I'm encrypting files with the new key.

data.name: UserNotExist
data.value: A user with this username is not found in the database.

data.name: Warning
data.value: Warning

data.name: WrongKey
data.value: Wrong encryption key.
